{{Quote|Wild lemons on a purple field: House Dalt of Lemonwood.|[[Podrick Payne]]|Two Swords}}
[[Image:Lemonwood Pin.png|thumb|right|200px|A map showing the location of Lemonwood on the continent of Westeros.]]
'''Lemonwood''' is a castle in [[Dorne]], the region controlled by [[House Martell]] of [[Sunspear]], and the seat of [[House Dalt]]. The castle is located on the east coast of Dorne, south of the mouth of the [[Greenblood]].<ref>[http://viewers-guide.hbo.com/game-of-thrones/season1/#!/locations/dorne/ HBO viewers guide, season 1 map, Dorne entry]</ref>
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, Lemonwood is the seat of [[House Dalt]], loyal vassals of the Martells. It lies just south of the Planky Town.
